TopicTitle: So, I don't think i've ever seen anything like this before

Articles.Content:
I... i just don't know what to say...![8D7SIzy.png](http://i.imgur.com/8D7SIzy.png)

-more on the 'backstory' later, i'll see if I can reproduce this once i get back to school

PS: this is by no means edited or photoshopped in any way

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T19:48:51Z" title="02/22/2015 07:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by tychochallenge**

Looks like a texture failed to load is all.

> 
> ![acu_bug_huYDJC2.jpg](http://www.kitguru.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/acu_bug_huYDJC2.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T05:35:09Z" title="02/22/2015 05:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by Greenfire32**
but... still, its pretty horrifying ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Ugh, I just *had* to read this thread right before bedtime.

Sweet dreams, I guess.
Don't say his name three times or he'll come for your daughter, Chuck.

Looks like

![grey-chameleon-16562140.jpg](http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/x/grey-chameleon-16562140.jpg)
Beetlejeb Beetlejeb Beetlejeb
A nightmare before Kristmas?
Did you know you can press F1 within KSP for a screenshot.
OOOh, peppermint flavored kerbals!
Unatural camouflage!
Why are you researching which countries still use DDT?

> 
> Why are you researching which countries still use DDT?

/\ This is why you use F1 to take in-game screenshots. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) In any case, yeah.. that kerbal looks like he uh.. er.. I don't know, *THAT'S MESSED UP*

> 
> Why are you researching which countries still use DDT?

it was for some school project... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> /\ This is why you use F1 to take in-game screenshots. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) In any case, yeah.. that kerbal looks like he uh.. er.. I don't know, *THAT'S MESSED UP*

it was because I took this pic when i was playing on a school computer, if I pressed F1, (unlike my home computer) i won't know where the screenshot would go, or if it was 'allowed' in the school computers, so I pressed 'print screen' and pasted/sent to myself via email.

(and if you're wondering, me and a couple of friends used hard-drives to install KSP on the school computers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> it was for some school project... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> it was because I took this pic when i was playing on a school computer, if I pressed F1, (unlike my home computer) i won't know where the screenshot would go, or if it was 'allowed' in the school computers, so I pressed 'print screen' and pasted/sent to myself via email.
> 
> (and if you're wondering, me and a couple of friends used hard-drives to install KSP on the school computers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Ok, even with that.... Why did you not just post the screenshot that you emailed yourself.... but instead you went to the point of taking a screen shot of that email on computer and post that... I just seriously don't understand.

> 
> Ok, even with that.... Why did you not just post the screenshot that you emailed yourself.... but instead you went to the point of taking a screen shot of that email on computer and post that... I just seriously don't understand.

Relevant xkcd:

![workaround.png](http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/workaround.png)

In any case, we can see the *important* content, does it really matter? (Well, aside from like, a meg of unneeded bandwith.)

> 
> Ok, even with that.... Why did you not just post the screenshot that you emailed yourself.... but instead you went to the point of taking a screen shot of that email on computer and post that... I just seriously don't understand.

Because, imgur 'didn't want to do that' (it kept refusing to accept my screenshot for some reason) so I had to take a screenshot of my whole computer with the screenshot of the messed-up kerbal

KSP Texture Fail - Bearable.

AC Unity Texture Fail - Horrifying.

Have you ever seen this one before?

![kSCXMf5.png](http://i.imgur.com/kSCXMf5.png)

![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) KSP, don't do this to me! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Have you ever seen this one before?
> -snip-
> 
> ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) KSP, don't do this to me! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

What's going on in here?

Special mention: 2 Michael Jordan's on the upper right hand corner.

He's running Windows OSX 7! :S

Seriously though, tychochallenge, you should have really pushed imgur a bit harder. That really is atrocious to look at.

(this is like my own version of [xkcd 1373](http://xkcd.com/1373/) - the windowed-windowed-windowed content is shortin' out my brain.. ARGH just take a proper screenshot! F1 in game! Or at least alt-printscreen in windows! or do some local editing - load the original screenshot in gimp, crop out the unwanted parts, and export it as .jpg - imgur has never rejected any of gimp's jpgs for me. ARGH! 039wus;jkaskldfjasdjklfSD)

EDIT: Sorta like.. THIS:

![fifqGR1.png](http://i.imgur.com/fifqGR1.png)

(loaded in gimp, cropped, exported as jpg, fed to imgur)
